allow: Bash(docker exec postgres_db psql -U myuser -d mydatabase -c "SELECT current_user;")
Bash(docker exec postgres_db psql -U myuser -d mydatabase -c "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS linkdb;")
Bash(docker exec postgres_db psql -U myuser -d mydatabase -c "CREATE DATABASE linkdb;")
Bash(docker exec postgres_db psql -U myuser -d linkdb -c "\dt")
Bash(docker exec postgres_db psql -U myuser -d linkdb -c "\d ""Link""")
Bash(docker exec postgres_db psql -U myuser -d linkdb -c "SELECT id, url, title, favorite, ""actressId"", ""createdAt"" FROM ""Link"" LIMIT 5;")
